Introduction
============

CSS frameworks that trying to cut down css work to create pages based on grid
layouts

960 grid system
---------------

960css_ Grid System is an effort to streamline web development workflow. 

The packaged version is 1.5

URLS:

* ++resource++960gs/960.css
* ++resource++960gs/960_24_col.css
* ++resource++960gs/reset.css
* ++resource++960gs/rtl_960_24_col.css
* ++resource++960gs/rtl_960.css
* ++resource++960gs/rtl_text.css
* ++resource++960gs/text.css

Source non minified is available under ++resource++960gs/src/

Documentation is available in the package.

Blueprint css
-------------

blueprintcss_ A CSS framework that aims to cut down on your CSS development time

The provided version is 0.9

URLS:

* ++resource++blueprintcss/ie.css
* ++resource++blueprintcss/print.css
* ++resource++blueprintcss/screen.css

Source non minified is available under ++resource++blueprintcss/src/

Plugins are available under ++resource++blueprintcss/plugins/

* buttons
* fancy-type
* link-icons
* rtl
